short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Control and save YouTube video playback speed across videos

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension that enhances your YouTube viewing experience by providing advanced playback speed controls. This extension allows you to easily adjust and save video playback speeds across different YouTube videos.
